[DQR.IFRS.0102.9542] Equity with a value of 6,769,000,000 is not equal to the combined total of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI and Noncontrolling Interest ( 5,815,000,000 + 460,000,000 ) with a value of 6,275,000,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:Equity fact are: Period :2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : GBP Decimals of Stockholders Equity Including Noncontrolling Interest : -6 Decimals of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI : -6 Decimals of Noncontrolling Interest : -6

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 02 - Profit or loss but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, phoenixgroupholdings:TaxChargeAttributableToOwners All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -
